# Lavi Nigam

> Personal blog on AI, technology, and building in public.

Author: Lavi Nigam — AI practitioner and builder. Also at theagentguy.ai

## Content
- /posts/ — All blog posts
- /about/ — About the author
- /tags/ — Browse posts by topic
- /archives/ — Chronological archive

## Topics
AI, machine learning, software engineering, building in public, tech strategy
